explanation: [0-0] The camera focuses on a large black frying pan on a gray-white table.

[0-2] Then a hand appears at the bottom of the screen, placing a rabbit-shaped mold into the black frying pan. A hand on the left side of the screen then uses a piping bag to squeeze chocolate batter into the rabbit mold. After filling the mold, the hand begins to squeeze plain batter around the rabbit shape until it forms a circle within the pan.

[0-2] Then a hand appears at the bottom of the screen, placing a rabbit-shaped mold into the black frying pan. A hand on the left side of the screen then uses a piping bag to squeeze chocolate batter into the rabbit mold. After filling the mold, the hand begins to squeeze plain batter around the rabbit shape until it forms a circle within the pan.

[2-5] The batter in the pan slowly spreads outwards. A hand reaches in from the right side of the screen and carefully removes the rabbit mold, revealing a clear rabbit shape in the batter. The scene then cuts to the batter in the pan, now cooked into a pancake. The pancake is lifted from the pan with a utensil.

The scene then cuts to the batter in the pan, now cooked into a pancake. The pancake is lifted from the pan with a utensil.

The scene then cuts to the batter in the pan, now cooked into a pancake. The pancake is lifted from the pan with a utensil.

[5-7] The scene cuts again to a long, gray utensil holding a cooked pancake over the black frying pan. The utensil then slides between the pancake and the pan, separating them. The scene cuts one last time to a metal plate with two cooked pancakes, each with a rabbit design. Beside the plate is a bowl of chocolate sauce. On the gray-white table is a wooden bowl filled with cocoa powder.
